text: Net grekha nad vami, muzhchiny, yesli vy dostoynym obrazom nameknote zhenshchine, chto khotite posvatat'sya k ney, kogda ona nakhoditsya v ustanovlennom dlya neyo sroke posle smerti muzha, ili skroyete eto namereniye v svoikh serdtsakh. On razreshil vam prosto namekat', a ne otkryto govorit' ob etom. Ne vkhodite v besedy s nimi tayno v etot ustanovlennyy dlya nikh srok, a vedite s nimi tol'ko pristoynuyu rech'. Nel'zya zaklyuchat' brachnyy soyuz do tekh por, poka ne proshol naznachennyy srok. Allakh znayet, chto vy skryvayete v svoikh serdtsakh. Boytes' nakazaniya Allakha i ne delayte togo, chto On zapretil. Ne teryayte nadezhdy na milost' Allakha. On Proshchayushch i Krotok, prinimayet pokayaniye ot Svoikh rabov i proshchayet poroki.
